lead_paragraph: Chelsea of the English Premier League will come to the United States to play the expansion Seattle Sounders of Major League Soccer in an exhibition game this summer. Chelsea lost to the M.L.S. All-Star team in 2006, and played the Los Angeles Galaxy in 2007. Chelsea has played in Seattle three times, against Scotland’s Celtic in 2004, against the Sounders of the North American Soccer League in 1977, and against an amateur team in 1967.
